name: v3.2.0
body: ## 3.2.0 (2017-07-30) #### Features * Add `underline` icon ([002a66a4](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/002a66a4)) * Add `shopping-cart` icon ([fb5d4329](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/fb5d4329), closes [#20](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/20), [#79](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/79), [#159](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/159)) * Add `italic` icon ([bad88ba2](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/bad88ba2)) * Add `help-circle` icon ([36f5fa7a](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/36f5fa7a), closes [#15](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/15), [#158](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/158)) * Add `crop` icon ([62a96677](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/62a96677)) * Add `bold` icon ([3faad03c](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/3faad03c), closes [#145](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/145))

name: v3.1.0
body: ## 3.1.0 (2017-07-11) #### Features * Move paths in `wifi` icon down 1px ([73bc017b](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/73bc017b)) * Add `wifi-off` icon ([f41cd6e7](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/f41cd6e7), closes [#125](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/125)) * Add `tv` icon ([29ff9df0](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/29ff9df0), closes [#106](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/106)) * Add `paperclip` icon ([aa43d5ad](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/aa43d5ad), closes [#85](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/85), [#131](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/131)) * Add `sliders` icon ([e95e1b27](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/e95e1b27), closes [#126](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/126)) * Add `gitlab` icon ([dfc03cd5](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/dfc03cd5), closes [#119](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/119))

name: v3.0.0
body: ## 3.0.0 (2017-07-03) #### Features * Add JavaScript library ([71f502fc](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/71f502fc)) * Flatten `icons` directory ([9b5dc811](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/9b5dc811)) #### Breaking Changes * The path to individual SVG files has changed. All SVGs now live on the same level inside the `icons` directory. For example, `icons/core/home.svg` is now `icons/home.svg`. ([9b5dc811](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/9b5dc811))

name: v2.4.0
body: ## 2.4.0 (2017-06-10) #### Features * Add `file-plus` icon ([40f5908d](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/40f5908d)) * Add `file-minus` icon ([c64304d1](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/c64304d1)) * Add corner arrow icons ([3c297deb](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/3c297deb), closes [#62](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/62)) * Add `percent` icon ([dd9f0ff1](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/dd9f0ff1), closes [#105](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/105)) * Change `pie-chart` icon ([e1107aae](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/e1107aae), closes [#102](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/102)) * Add `save` icon ([dfcd3e3b](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/dfcd3e3b), closes [#39](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/39)) * Change `copy` icon ([915524f6](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/915524f6)) * Add `users` icon ([650c8ab1](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/650c8ab1), closes [#81](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/81)) * Add `sidebar` icon ([89ed5ac5](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/89ed5ac5)) * Add `file-text` icon ([f0a061e2](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/f0a061e2), closes [#23](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/23))

body: ## 2.3.0 (2017-06-07) #### Features * Add `film` icon ([765b9173](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/765b9173), closes [#22](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/22)) * Add `stop-circle` icon ([82a62ca0](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/82a62ca0), closes [#43](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/43)) * Add `play-circle` icon ([a4a1feda](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/a4a1feda), closes [#43](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/43)) * Add `pause-circle` icons ([0b5f9d44](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/0b5f9d44), closes [#43](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/43)) * Add `tablet` icon ([e0facf6f](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/e0facf6f), closes [#52](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/52)) * Add `smartphone` icon ([4fa54b53](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/4fa54b53), closes [#51](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/51)) * Add `shield` icon ([8c12a6d8](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/8c12a6d8), closes [#54](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/54)) * Add `server` icon ([a5a3d7d0](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/a5a3d7d0), closes [#37](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/37)) * Add `credit-card` icon ([612ab72d](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/commit/612ab72d), closes [#18](https://github.com/colebemis/feather/issues/18))

name: v2.1.0
body:
### Added

- Add icon categories (Thanks @wappsdotgr)
- Display icon names to allow for `⌘ + F` search

<details>
  <summary>Add 37 icons</summary>

  - `arrow-down-left`
  - `arrow-down-right`
  - `arrow-up-left`
  - `arrow-up-right`
  - `battery-charging`
  - `cast`
  - `chevrons-down`
  - `chevrons-left`
  - `chevrons-right`
  - `chevrons-up`
  - `cloud-drizzle`
  - `cloud-lightning`
  - `cloud-rain`
  - `cloud-snow`
  - `codepen`
  - `compass`
  - `edit-2`
  - `edit-3`
  - `link-2`
  - `list`
  - `log-in`
  - `log-out`
  - `navigation-2`
  - `package`
  - `repeat`
  - `share`
  - `slack`
  - `speaker`
  - `trending-down`
  - `trending-up`
  - `type`
  - `user-check`
  - `user-x`
  - `voicemail`
  - `volume`
  - `volume-1`
  - `volume-2`
</details>

### Changed

- Redesign project site

<details>
  <summary>Change 9 icons</summary>

  - `bar-chart`
  - `bar-chart-2`
  - `droplet`
  - `grid`
  - `twitter`
  - `user-minus`
  - `user-plus`
  - `user`
  - `volume-x`
</details>

  - `twitter`
  - `user-minus`
  - `user-plus`
  - `video-off`
  - `wind`
  - `zap`
</details>

### Changed

- Redesign project website
- Use SVG `stroke` instead of `fill`. Read more about the benefits of SVG `stroke`:
  - [SVG Stroke FTW!](http://danklammer.com/articles/svg-stroke-ftw/)

<details>
  <summary>Change 66 icons</summary>

  - `align-center`
  - `anchor`
  - `arrow-down`
  - `arrow-left`
  - `arrow-right`
  - `arrow-up`
  - `bar-chart`
  - `bar-chart-2`
  - `battery`
  - `bell`
  - `book`
  - `bookmark`
  - `box`
  - `briefcase`
  - `camera`
  - `check`
  - `check-circle`
  - `check-square`
  - `clipboard`
  - `cloud`
  - `cog`
  - `comment-square`
  - `download`
  - `download-cloud`
  - `droplet`
  - `external-link`
  - `fast-forward`
  - `file`
  - `flag`
  - `folder`
  - `heart`
  - `image`
  - `inbox`
  - `layers`
  - `layout`
  - `lock`
  - `mail`
  - `maximize`
  - `maximize-2`
  - `minimize`
  - `minimize-2`
  - `minus`
  - `moon`
  - `move`
  - `pause`
  - `play`
  - `plus`
  - `printer`
  - `search`
  - `share`
  - `shuffle`
  - `skip-back`
  - `skip-forward`
  - `star`
  - `rewind`
  - `tag`
  - `unlock`
  - `upload`
  - `upload-cloud`
  - `user`
  - `video`
  - `watch`
  - `wifi`
  - `x`
  - `zoom-in`
  - `zoom-out`
</details>

### Removed
- Remove PSD, CSH and Webfont formats in favor of SVG. Read more about the benefits of SVG for icons:
  - [Inline SVG vs Icon Fonts [CAGEMATCH]](https://css-tricks.com/icon-fonts-vs-svg/)
  - [Seriously, Don’t Use Icon Fonts](https://cloudfour.com/thinks/seriously-dont-use-icon-fonts/)
  - [Ten reasons we switched from icon font to SVG](http://ianfeather.co.uk/ten-reasons-we-switched-from-an-icon-font-to-svg/)
